title: Harold's fairy tale
creator_credit: Gene Deitch, Morton Schindel and Weston Woods Studios
brief_description: Harold draws an enchanted garden, only to discover that nothing can grow there because of the machinations of a giant witch. With the aid of his purple crayon, he defeats the witch and makes the garden bloom again. A delightful animated story for children. Based on the book by Crockett Johnson.
